text:
Currently, it's impossible to configure log4j.xconf with Lenya. Find a patch
attached to this bug: 2 files for patching log4j.xconf (with a sample
configuration for Chainsaw) and a diff file for the necessary modifications in
init-build.xml. As soon as the patch is applied I will update the Wiki
documentation for Chainsaw integration:
http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/HowToLoggingWithChainsaw?highlight=%28chainsaw%29
